brand: LEGO The Lord of the Rings

i18n.displayName: LEGO® The Lord of the Rings
i18n.longDescription:
Join Frodo, the amiable Hobbit, and his friends as they embark on a noble quest. Journey across Middle-earth as one of more than 80 characters and jump between the saga’s many storylines in LEGO® The Lord of the Rings™ for PC download. Based on the immensely popular motion picture trilogy, the game reimagines the story’s epic events with the humor and the endless variety of LEGO play. Experience epic battles, uncover secrets and hidden treasures and craft helpful objects as you play as characters and relive events from the beloved trilogy.

Trusted with the dangerous task to destroy an ancient magical ring that threatens all that is good, Frodo is forced to leave his peaceful home. But the ring wants to return to its evil master and the road to Mount Doom—the only place where it can be destroyed—will be perilous and riddled with Orcs and fouler things. To help Frodo, a Fellowship of nine heroes is formed. Players relive the legend through the LEGO minifigures as they explore wonders, solve timeless riddles and overcome endless foes in their quest to destroy The One Ring.

Game features::

• Explore the open world of Middle-earth: Face thrilling battles with Orcs, Uruk-hai, the Balrog, the Witch-king, and other fearsome creatures. Play as more than 80 unlockable characters, including Frodo, Aragorn, Gandalf and many others. Wield the power of magical seeing stones to jump between multiple storylines.
• Relive the films LEGO-style: Experience the heroes in an all new way and with a light-hearted twist.
• Collect and create items to help you on your journey: Discover a variety of weaponry and magical items, including the Light of Earendil, Elven rope, swords and bows on your trek to Mount Doom. Combine and forge new items in the Blacksmith Shop using Mithril, the most precious metal in Middle-earth.
• Share the fun: Play with family and friends with an easy access drop-in, drop-out gameplay option.

i18n.shortDescription: An epic tale is reimagined with playful and humorous style in LEGO® The Lord of the Rings™ for PC download.
i18n.systemRequirements:
Operating System: Microsoft® Windows® XP SP3, Vista, or Windows® 7
Processor: Dual Core CPU @ 2GHz (Pentium D or better)
Memory: 1GB RAM
Hard Disk Space: 8 GB free HDD space
Video Card: NVIDIA® 7600, 7800, 8800 GT or ATI Radeon™ HD 1950 or higherSingle-player/multi-player/co-op Single Player, Multiplayer, Co-op
Supports: Cloud Saves
Other requirements: 16-bit Sound Card
